basic_data.restraint_type: Driver and front passenger front airbags with occupant sensing deactivation, front side airbags and front and rear side curtain airbags.

equipment.name: Multi-function remote
equipment.value: hands-free multi-function remote with keyless ignition

equipment.name: Warnings and reminders
equipment.value: lamp failure, low fuel, engine oil, coolant

equipment.name: Navigation system
equipment.value: hard drive navigation system w/voice activation

basic_data.restraint_type: Driver and front passenger front airbags with occupant sensing deactivation, front side airbags and front and rear side curtain airbags.

equipment.name: Multi-function remote
equipment.value: hands-free multi-function remote with keyless ignition

equipment.name: Warnings and reminders
equipment.value: lamp failure, low fuel, engine oil, coolant

equipment.name: Navigation system
equipment.value: hard drive navigation system w/voice activation

option.name: California Emissions
option.description: Includes emissions controls required for vehicles sold in California.

option.name: Front License Plate Holder
option.description: Includes front license plate holder for states which require front license plates.

option.name: Front Grille Filler Panel
option.description: Includes front grille filler panel with chrome strips for states without license plate requirement.

option.name: Rear Side Airbags
option.description: Includes rear seat side thorax airbags.

option.name: Audi Side Assist
option.description: Audi side assist monitors the blind spot areas as well as fast-approaching vehicles at a range of 150 ft to the rear of the car. If Audi side assist identifies another vehicle, it informs the driver via an LED light in the exterior mirror.

option.name: All Weather Floor Mats (set of 4) and Trunk Liner
option.description: Includes precision-fit mats that are skid-resistant.

option.name: Wheel Lock Kit
option.description: Includes wheel locks for the alloy wheels.

option.name: 18 In. Sport Package
option.description: Includes all-season tires, 18-inch wheels, sport suspension and 3 spoke multifunction sport steering wheel with shift paddles.

option.name: 19 In. Sport Package
option.description: Includes summer performance tires, 19-inch wheels, sport suspension and 3 spoke multifunction sport steering wheel with shift paddles.

option.name: Cold Weather Package
option.description: Includes heated rear seats and 4 spoke multifunction steering wheel, heated and with shift paddles.
